mapper.select: select ps.*,d.name device,p.name project,pu.name projectUnit from project_segment ps LEFT JOIN project_unit pu ON ps.projectUnitId=pu.id LEFT JOIN project p ON pu.projectId=p.id LEFT JOIN device d ON ps.deviceId=d.id where ps.appId=#{appId}
